channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here, the Law Is King
item.description: We promise to give you analysis that starts with what the law is — not ‘No Kings’ hysteria.

item.title: The Atlantic Says It’s Trump Officials’ Own Fault They Have To Flee Homes For Safety
item.description: Trump officials are fleeing their homes in the face of left-wing threats, but The Atlantic says the problem is actually Trump's rhetoric.

item.title: The Clinging Evil of Antisemitism
item.description: We shouldn’t tolerate hatred of Jews disguised as foreign-policy talk.

item.title: Trump says China will not get Nvidia's best computer chips
item.description: President Trump says Nvidia, the highly valuable chipmaker, will not provide its advanced Blackwell chips to China as the world's largest economies vi...

item.title: The Virtue of Liberty: A Response to the NatCons
item.description: To abandon limited government is to corrupt conservatism.

item.title: Trump says he won't attend Supreme Court hearing on his tariffs
item.description: President Trump reversed course Sunday, posting on social media that he won't attend Supreme Court arguments on Wednesday concerning legal challenges ...

item.title: I Fought A War Against Radical Islamists Like The One New York Is About To Elect
item.description: Radical Islam has made its way into America. It is already here, and it is spreading. America cannot be consumed by it.

item.title: John Roberts And Congress Need To Immediately Stop Gross Ethical Violations By Federal Judges
item.description: Judges have life tenure to insulate them from political pressure, not so they can act like politicians in robes.

item.title: The U.S. Should Resume Nuclear Weapons Testing
item.description: Men are not angels, and therefore the United States must always maintain an arsenal designed to deter aggression from nations that wish us ill.

item.title: Presidential Pardons Are Needed For Trump Electors Persecuted By Biden DOJ
item.description: President Trump should immediately pardon every person indicted by the partisan Democrat prosecutors doing the bidding of the Biden DOJ.

item.title: New Mexico’s ‘Free’ Child Care an Attempt to Cover for Past Failures
item.description: New Mexico’s track record of competently delivering services to help its children is poor to say the least.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Milk SNAP For Taxpayer-Funded Free Food
item.description: The SNAP program is so generous it feeds people in a home who are not eligible for the program.

item.title: Newsom: Tuesday's elections will mark turning point in Trump presidency
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom of California said Sunday that he is "deeply confident" that voters this week will sign off on new congressional maps that favor Dem...

item.title: Spanberger holds double-digit edge over Earle-Sears in Virginia gubernatorial race, poll shows
item.description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger has the upper hand against Republican Lt. Gov. Winsome Earle-Sears in polling for Virginia's gubernatorial race.

item.title: SNAP benefits in jeopardy as government shutdown drags into fifth week
item.description: The government shutdown, entering its fifth week, has begun to threaten vital food assistance programs used by tens of millions of Americans, promptin...
